help_main_description:
A music bot for Discord.

Use the buttons below to browse commands.
help_general_description:
`/invite` - Invite bot to other servers
`/coffee` - Support TAPI
`/channel` - Set/unset music command channel
help_music_description:
**Playback**
`/connect` - Connect to voice channel
`/play [song/link/playlist]` - Play music (YouTube, Spotify)
`/spplay [song/link]` - Search and play from Spotify
`/scplay [song/link]` - Search and play from SoundCloud
`/pause` - Pause / Resume
`/skip` - Skip to next song
`/disconnect` - Leave voice channel

**Queue & Volume**
`/volume [1-100]` - Adjust volume
`/queue` - View queue
`/shuffle` - Toggle shuffle
`/repeat` - Toggle repeat

**More**
`/nowplaying` - Current song info
`/remove [number]` - Remove song from queue
`/clear` - Clear entire queue

**Playlists**
`/save` - Save current queue as your playlist
`/load` - Load your saved playlist
music_already_connected_voice_channel: I'm already on the voice channel!
music_no_playing_music: There are no music currently playing!
music_input_over_vol: :loud_sound: | The volume is limited to 1% to 100%!
music_recommend_footer: Choose your favorite song using the dropdown and buttons below!
music_recommend_youtube_only: Recommendations only work for YouTube songs!
music_recommend_not_found: Couldn't find recommendations. Please try again later!
music_recommend_error: An error occurred with the recommendation feature
music_recommend_all_added_description:
Based on **{track_title}**
{count} songs added to queue.
music_dc_not_connect_voice_channel: You are not connected to the voice channel!
music_dc_not_connect_my_voice_channel: {name} is not on my voice channel!
music_not_in_voice_channel_description: ⚠️ To use this command, you need to join a voice channel first.
music_not_connected_voice_channel: :warning: | You are not connected to the voice channel!
music_no_permission: :warning: | Permission Denied! (Give me Connect, Speak permission!)
music_come_in_my_voice_channel: :warning: | You're on another voice channel! Please come to my voice channel.
other_invite_description: Click [here]({link}) to add TAPI to your server.
music_search_select: Select a song to play from the list below
music_queue_cleared_desc: {count} songs have been removed from the queue.
music_no_music_in_queue: There is no music in the queue.
music_auto_disconnect_log: Bot automatically left voice channel in guild '{guild_name}' (no users in channel)
vote_description: If you enjoy using TAPI, consider voting or leaving a review below.
vote_required_description:
Please vote for TAPI to continue using it.
You only need to vote once.
music_queue_skip_failed: Failed to skip to selected track
coffee_description: Your support helps cover server costs and development.
playlist_save_empty: Nothing to save! Play some music first.
playlist_save_error: Failed to save playlist. Please try again.
playlist_save_truncated: Only the first {max} tracks were saved (beta limit).
playlist_load_failed: Failed to load any tracks from this playlist.
playlist_not_found:
You don't have a saved playlist yet.
Use `/save` while music is playing to create one.
playlist_empty: Your saved playlist has no tracks.
music_queue_full_partial: Only {added} of {total} tracks were added (queue limit: {max})
channel_set: Music commands are now restricted to {channel}!
music_wrong_text_channel: Music commands can only be used in {channel}!
